cause.description:
To foster Jewish pride and identity by providing a warm environment that enables Penn State students to explore their Jewish heritage regardless of religious background or financial status.
To be a true ‘Home Away from Home’ for every Jewish student at Penn State. Chabad of Penn State provides warm, home-cooked Shabbat meals free of charge every Friday night as well as classes, social events, women's events, holiday programs, trips, social action and more!
1. Every Penn State Jew should have a home away from home
2. To discover the warmth and fun in Judaism
cause.mission: Be a home away from home for every Jew at Penn State
cause.name: Chabad of Penn State
